Mercury::BundleSendingMap

Mercury::BundleSendingMap Class Reference

This class is useful when you have a lot of data you want to send to a collection of other apps, but want to group the sends to each app together. More...

#include <bundle.hpp>

 BundleSendingMap (NetworkInterface &networkInterface)
Bundle & operator[] (const Address &addr)
 This method returns the bundle for the given address, mapping the channel in if necessary.
void sendAll ()
 This method sends all the pending bundles on channels in this map.

Detailed Description

This class is useful when you have a lot of data you want to send to a collection of other apps, but want to group the sends to each app together.
